requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10300H @ 2.50GHZ
  • Memory: 8600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You really should be able to run this game on lower spec hardware than what is indicated so long as your hardware supports OpenGL 3.2 and or Directx12 and are on Windows 10; I just don't have access to many test machines.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
